mapper.select: select ap.activity_plan_id as activityPlanId, ap.name as name, ap.description as description, ap.departure as departure, ap.destination as destination, ap.price as price, ap.price_desc as priceDesc, ap.take_time as takeTime, ap.traffic as traffic, ap.min_pepole_num as minPepoleNum, ap.max_pepole_num as maxPepoleNum, ap.pre_reg_day as preRegDay, ap.create_time as createTime, ap.sort as sort, ap.image_url as imageURL, ap.topic as topic, ap.exp_inclusive as expInclusive, ap.has_saled as hasSaled, ap.type as type, ap.discount as discount, ap.good_review_per as goodReviewPer, ap.topic_id as topicId from mc_activity_plan ap where ap.activity_plan_id = #{activityPlanId}

select ap.activity_plan_id as activityPlanId, ap.name as name, ap.description as description, ap.departure as departure, ap.destination as destination, ap.price as price, ap.price_desc as priceDesc, ap.take_time as takeTime, ap.traffic as traffic, ap.min_pepole_num as minPepoleNum, ap.max_pepole_num as maxPepoleNum, ap.pre_reg_day as preRegDay, ap.create_time as createTime, ap.sort as sort, ap.image_url as imageURL, ap.topic as topic, ap.exp_inclusive as expInclusive, ap.has_saled as hasSaled, ap.type as type, ap.discount as discount, ap.good_review_per as goodReviewPer, ap.topic_id as topicId from mc_activity_plan ap where ap.activity_plan_id = #{0} or ap.name like CONCAT('%',#{0},'%' )

select mt.parent_id as parentId, pmt.tag as pName, mat.tag_id as tagId, mat.tag_name as tag from mc_activity_tags mat inner join mc_tags mt on mat.tag_id = mt.tag_id inner join mc_tags pmt on mt.parent_id = pmt.tag_id where mat.activity_plan_id = #{activityPlanId}
mapper.update: update mc_activity_plan set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, sort = #{sort}, topic = #{topic}, exp_inclusive = #{expInclusive} where activity_plan_id = #{activityPlanId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mc_activity_plan ( activity_plan_id, name, description, type, sort, topic, exp_inclusive ) VALUES ( #{activityPlanId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{topic}, #{expInclusive} )
